dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4281 IH: Expanding Access to Capital for Rural Job Creators Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Kihuen (for himself and Mr. Mooney of West Virginia) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to expand access to capital for rural-area small businesses, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Expanding Access to Capital for Rural Job Creators Act.

section.header: Access to capital for rural-area small businesses
section.text: Section 4 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (15 U.S.C. 78d) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subsection (j)(4)(C), by striking and women-owned small businesses and inserting , women-owned, and rural-area small businesses; and
in subsection (j)(6)(B)(iii), by striking and women-owned small businesses and inserting , women-owned, and rural-area small businesses.
